comments:
Build: F1

I deleted my one launch config and hit the run button.  I got the following
message in an error dialog and the following walkback in the log.  This happens
everytime I delete a launch config.

<error dialog>
Launch Configuration Error

Exception occurred processing launch configuration. See long for more information

Reason:
  Launch configuration does not exist.
</error dialog>

Also worth noting is that whenever I hover over the icons, they still display
the name of the launch config I deleted.

Cannot duplicate.  This sounds a lot like bug#16838, which I fixed earlier.  Please re-open if you 
find a test case.
marking as "works for me" according to Joe's note.
